name: Booqable Rental Plugin
author: Booqable Rental Software

sections.description:
Booqable is the most convenient solution for directly adding online bookings and availability to your WordPress site. Booqable’s software simplifies the rental process and is trusted by many small to medium-sized rental business owners. Improve your online presence and start easily renting out your products by installing the Booqable WordPress rental plugin – just a few clicks away!

This plugin seamlessly connects your WordPress website to your Booqable account, empowering you to effortlessly incorporate online booking functionality and kickstart your rental business online.

Note: You can get started with a free trial to use this plugin. Learn more about Booqable and its pricing at booqable.com.

Key Features:

Effortless Product Integration:

Utilize customizable shortcodes to showcase your rental products across your WordPress pages. Enjoy full support for categories, variations, bundles, multiple images, and flexible pricing settings.

Real-Time Availability:

Stay ahead with a comprehensive booking calendar featuring real-time inventory availability updates. Whether you’re receiving orders online or in person, Booqable ensures your inventory remains synchronized, preventing any risk of overbooking.

Streamlined Hosted Checkout:

Experience the convenience of hassle-free transactions with a hosted checkout system. From processing paid orders to managing customer inquiries, Booqable ensures a swift checkout experience, automatically sending out booking confirmations.

Secure Online Payments:

Integrate seamlessly with Stripe and PayPal to accept various payment methods, including credit cards and local options. Tailor your checkout process by specifying payment terms, accepting security deposits, and facilitating the use of coupon codes.

Getting Started is Easy:

Install the plugin, connect it to your Booqable account, and start adding your products. Don’t have a Booqable account? No worries! Sign up for a free 14-day trial and upgrade your account anytime to unlock even more features.

Experience the future of online rentals with Booqable – revolutionizing how you do business, one click at a time.
sections.installation:
Sign up for a Booqable account here if you haven’t already.

To connect the plugin to your Booqable account, you’ll need to enter your company ID.

In Booqable:
1. Go to Settings > Online reservations > Installation
2. Click WordPress Plugin
3. Copy your Company ID

Then, in WordPress:
4. Click Settings > Booqable
5. Paste your company ID in the corresponding field

To embed products:
– In Booqable: make sure you have at least one rental product
– In WordPress: Embed a product, product button, or product list on any page or post using shortcodes

sections.screenshots:
1. Allow people to browse and book your inventory online

  2. Quickly add your products by copy-pasting shortcodes

  3. Show when items are available to rent (optional)

  4. Let your customers pay online or request a quote
sections.reviews:
Good Plugin, easy!

By merakermultiservice on September 7, 2021

Good plugin for Booqable. Easy to integrate to existing pages and posts. Working flawless with WooCommerce.

Fantastic rental management platform

By artilimartili on April 12, 2021

We have been using Booqable on our website from the beginning and it is a fantastic platform and without question we cannot imagine business without it. It provides great rental management platform, inventory and CRM in one place. Really easy to use and to integrate, worth every penny! Don't hesitate to try if you are looking into this kind of business.

One stop rental management software

By nikoioannou on March 31, 2021

We have been using Booqable on our website for three years and it has been extremely helpful for our business. A great rental management plugin that streamlines admin work offering product control, inventory management, and CRM all in one place.

Easy to manage content from one system

By madbern on March 12, 2021

We already use Booqble and it's WP-plugin allows us to control the content all from one spot. We dont use it on all our products, but the smaller items don't require any admin from our side anymore. Would be good if they had more international payment integration.

Very well functioning rental management software

By oksanapoliakova on August 3, 2020

We have been using Booqable as a service to help us manage our rental inventory and process for three years, it's been working very well for our business. The plugin helps you integrate Booqable with your WordPress website and works really well for us. It is not a free service but it's not a scam either like someone commented below. It's a very well functioning rental management CRM system.

SCAM PLUGIN

By gianmarcovarrone on July 28, 2020

NOT A FREE PLUGIN AS ADVERTISED - time waste

Not Free at all

By zigots007 on December 17, 2019

you didn't mentioned about 14 day free trial at all in description. please don't make us waste our time
